description: Witch Queen Guns and other god rolls
name: blk-wishlist

data.description: #Adds #PvE This thing is nuts. Subsistence and Frenzy are the perfect combo here, but the new focus fire perk is good as well. Do pair this with Void 3.0 volatile rounds or other void subclass things. Adrenaline Junkie is another damage option if you are running nade-nation.
data.name: PvE God Tier

data.description: Explosive is great. Fury is ok. Headstone if you need stasis synergy. #Adds #Boss
data.name: PvE

data.description: Grenade-pa-looza. Pairs with Ogma to have two slots with grenade-nation.
data.name: nader fever

data.description: This is my personal roll. You may not care but grenade land Hoooo!
data.name: Grenade God Roll

data.description: Really want Successful Warmup here with firmly planted, charge rate and range stability. Master work stability or charge time is fine with me. Firmly planted/Successful Warm-up Or high impact instead of warm up is good too. For PvP though meta is rapid fire for CQC so craft your own Likely Suspect. This thing is for out-ranging. It's a one-trick pony. Use it till you die.
data.name: Ranged killer

data.description: You only want reservoir burst or High impact with compulsive reload. If you don't care about reservoir burst, maybe because you have a Null Composure already, try for a different rapid-fire fusion that can have vorpal-like cartesian coordinate.
data.name: Ranged PvE

data.description: This is the god roll. Max DPS for bosses. This is the best perk for boss dps. Max damage and we can't craft it... #PvE #Boss
data.name: PvE Godroll

data.description: Good roll here for PvE. Adds you want chain reaction, boss timed payload or explosive light. Frenzy is for both but not as good in either situation.
data.name: PvE Good

data.description: Reloading is not needed with both triple tap and fourth times the charm if you hit your precisions.
data.name: PvE Godroll

data.description: Triple Tap with any damage perk is good here. For god roll fourth times the charm is hyped up but this will get most damage per shot. One for all/Frenzy never fails. Vorpal for bosses only and rampage is easy procing after kills with decent timer. For more damage One for all or frenzy.
data.name: PvE Strong

data.description: Not crazy for PvP, but if you like the looks, zen moment/dynamic sway will be pin point as it gets. Range or stability the rest of the way.
data.name: PvP Ok

data.description: Replace your non-adept with this. This god roll is forth times the charm with triple tap
data.name: Strong PvE

data.description: Snapshot opening shot. Done and done. For a better pvp sniper you might want to try getting a fugue or crafting a sniper with underpressue/opening shot.
data.name: PvP

data.description: You want this triple tap and firing line for PvE. Great option.
data.name: PvE Great

data.description: Really Threat detector and opening shot/moving target here is the god roll but other great perks too.
data.name: Great Slug PvP

data.description: God roll here is subsistence or lead from gold with Frenzy.
data.name: PvE DPS

data.description: Get highest range possible with perks and masterwork as reload or range/handling
data.name: PvE God

data.description: Snapshot opening shot, good as it gets on this. Even with hard to get, Fugue is just as good and the craftable sniper is better.
data.name: Decent PvP

data.description: Huge perk pool...but some decent ones. Subsistence and one for all is great for PvE. The new focused fury synergizes just as well if you don't need the damage. Any damage last column is good.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Good Roll here. Check for potential God rolls of: 1) Outlaw/Kill Clip 2) Rapid Hit/Range Finder 3) Rapid Hit/Opening Shot. If you need to get even more picky, Arrowhead Brake is best barrel and Richochet Rounds is best rounds for it. Range Masterwork.
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: This origin trait is awesome. PvE Amazing. Subsistence and Focused Fury/One For All. That's what you really want but overflow is a good subsistence replacement. Both do amazing but one for all damage is easier to get than focus fury, and you get the damage earlier in the mag.
data.name: PvE Potential God roll

data.description: Currently the best handcannon. Better than palindrome, etc. Suros synergy origin trait plays a lot here. Take your pick but eye of the storm/Heating Up and opening shot/range finder are probably slightly the best. Most agree Eye of the Storm and Rangefinder are the godroll with masterwork range for max range. Masterwork Range.
data.name: PvP Godroll Alert potential

data.description: Adaptive munitions and disruption break. This is great and high end content to shred shields. Any damage perk is good but this is a unique gun that can get both shield perks together.
data.name: PvE High End Content

data.description: Good legendary PvP Sniper. Hard to get a good roll but ideally no distractions with snapshot sights, or moving target/Box Breathing if you don't need snapshot. Again Suros perk is great here to reduce flinch. Zoom on this is a bit high but if you can deal its great.
data.name: PvP A Tier

data.description: Fourth times the charm firing line is basic great. Any other damage perk is good. Auto loading is ok for quick swaps.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Veist origin in PvE again is great. Side arms are ok. Best PvE Sidearm if you like.
data.name: PvE

data.description: If you have to take a sidearm in PvP this is not bad. Won't beat exotic Forerunner, but as far as legendary goes, only thing that beats this is Peacebond but the roll for that is hard to get.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Rapid hit and kill clip is the most sought after. Its a 180 rpm though...so not as hard hitting. If you want adagio can make it a 140 if you get one kill. Worth trying out for the iron wolf perk in iron banner to get stealth radar.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Add clear monster with chain reaction on a spin cycle of death. Not going to out dps bosses like guillotine though.
data.name: PvE Vortex Frame

data.description: If you need a sword in PvP, other than eager edge on 30th anniversary swords, this in iron banner can make you stealthy for the close kills
data.name: PvP Ok

data.description: Solo content gun! The last member of your fireteam origin perk triggers for solo content. Triple tap and forth times the charm are good for this but damage perks are good in place of forth times the charm like vorpal or focused fire.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Solo weapon upgrade to adept. Triple tap and fourth times the charm again is the no reload desired roll. Its nothing bad if you get a damage perk instead of fourth times the charm though.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Fourth-column is what matters here. For bosses or adds explosive light, frenzy, or one for all in that order. For Adds adrenaline junkie can also work with nade-nation. Chill clip for utility. Pick your favorite third-column perk. I like impulse for speed which increases DPS. #PvE #Adds
data.name: PvE Nade launcher Decent

data.description: Reloading is not needed with both triple tap and fourth times the charm if you hit your precisions.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Fourth-column is what matters here. For bosses explosive light, frenzy, or one for all in that order. For Adds adrenaline junkie can also work with nade-nation. Chill clip for utility. Pick your favorite third-column perk. I like impulse for speed which increases DPS. #PvE #Boss
data.name: PvE Boss Decent

data.description: Nade Nation #PvE #NadeNation I like spamming grenades. For any boss or adds, a grenade build would love this with another similar energy/kinetic for one size fits all nade spamming with void 3.0 volatile grenades.
data.name: Nade Nation

data.description: This is a Gambit weapon, for Gambit. Invader tracker is great for the "Sentry" role of your team. You can pick any damage perk in the last column but frenzy or moving target are great for the damage consistency and moving target for the utility of headshots. Range as high as possible. The third column is best spent getting stability as high as possible to keep on target. #PvP #PvE #Gambit
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: Rapid Fire frames are in for PvP now. This perk pool can outgun messengers. Best Pulse for PvP. Better yet, its craftable. If you got this great! But you'll want to unlock the crafting later to fine-tune your needs. Recoil is something you really want to be controlled on this. Arrowhead brake all the way. rounds should be best range, and heating up in the perfect third column but the perpetual motion is second best. Moving target to keep sticky headshots and for your mod, put on the counter balance stock if you didn't get the 85-90 recoil direction otherwise your choice of Icarus for jumping or sprint grip for run n' gun.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Decent PvE Choice with any damage perk and overflow or stats for all dependin on your personal preference.
data.name: PvE

data.description: Best ranged fusion for PvP in the rapid fire category. Amazing potential. You can craft your barrel and charge rate later, but if you don't have the pattern unlocked, just firmly planted and successful warm-up. All day. #PvP #GodTier
data.name: PvP

data.description: As close as a bow can get to a machine gun so far. Great add clear potential with rapid fire shots, especial for end game content. Craft the others tuff you want later on when you unlock it.
#Adds clear. #PvE great AoE damage here. Either explosive for champions or dragonfly for mini-trinity ghoul that doesn't take up your exotic slot. Later on craft fastest drawtime or accuracy you can.

Triple tap with One For All is your best PvE bet. For champs vorpal is 2nd best, and for adds fury is second best, but more flexible because you can use it for champions too. Craft later when you unlock it.

For bosses lasting impression is the best, with frenzy being second best but best for adds. Adrenaline Junkie is third best here because it requires a grenade to get max stacks without wasting rockets, but nade-nation builds might not care.

This isn't the best PvP SMG out there. Multimach is still better. But its decent. God Rolls: 1) Perpetual Motion/Rangefinder 2) Killing Wind/Frenzy or Adrenaline for more damage but requires setup. Range Masterwork if need to be picky.

Eye of the Storm is the S-Tier option but Rangefinder or opening shot decent alternatives in that order. For grip, Heavy for recoil but smooth/polymer are decent backups. Barrel is up to you but range is the desired stat so extended or hammer-forged are best here. Barrel won't break the gun though.
data.name: PvP Desire

data.description: Any Vorpal will be good here. Shuts down supers in crucible. Again barrel is up to you but higher range is great with stability the next focus. Any stock is good with stability of Fitted giving both recoil and stability being the best but the stock really isn't all that important. Not Quite a Godroll though
data.name: PvP Decent

data.description: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods.
data.name: PvP Roll

data.description: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads.
data.name: PvP

data.description: ok roll but Krait is going to outshine this thing in current PvE meta. Handy for higher end content if you need the range. Get any damage perk in last column. Dragonfly for adds, focused fury for most easy to get damage boost, with rampage next followed by multi-kill clip
data.name: PvE

data.description: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads. Best PvP auto with the recommended rolls overall.
data.name: PvP

data.description: ok roll but Krait is going to outshine this thing in current PvE meta. Handy for higher end content if you need the range. Get any damage perk in last column. Dragonfly for adds, focused fury for most easy to get damage boost, with rampage next followed by multi-kill clip. Harmony for potential synergy with good specials/Heavy that finish combatants but not optimal. Wellspring for utility builds. In third column overflow is going to be great, but dynamic sway can help keep crits to proc damage from focused fury or get dragonfly procs on crit kills.
data.name: PvE Ok

data.description: Best use would be outlaw kill clip with the most range you can get stability second. Alternatively, blunt execution rounds is a great melee build synergy. Rangefinder is good as well in place of kill clip but kill clip will get you that big damage in team shooting.
data.name: PvP

data.description: Only PvE roll you want here is demolitionist/adrenaline junkie for grenade builds. Other than that no good PvE Perks on this weapon that can outclass any other pulse in the energy slot...
Any damage perk in last column is good, snapshot sights is ok as a backup. This scout is all about range and used in long range maps for it. #PvP

Fourth times the charm or subsistence and one for all is the god roll here, but any damage perk can work. Proc one for all with hits then have fun with nice 5s long damage you can keep refreshing after it expires.
Focused fury with fourth times the charm for straight up damage, dragonfly with dragonfly spec mod for add clear. #PvE
data.name: PvE

data.description: READ! Rolls to look for: Moving Target/Snapshot Sights for fast pace with high aim assist, OR High Impact Reserves for one shot body shots using any damage booster. If you get High impact reserves and ANYTHING. Save it. You need a mag extending perk to get both rounds for High impact to count. If not a warlock, get any other damage boosting effect to proc body shots. Kill clip is one kill and then free body shots. Vorpal for super shutdowns. The range is great on this thing so lots of aim assist. Depending on the barrel/rounds you might not want range masterwork. With this gun its Range, then handling to be faster with it. If you have hammer forged barrel with accurized rounds then you already hit near max range, and pushing it to 100 isn't that big of a deal. If you got opening shot with that, then congrats you're max range, but no snapshot sights. Firmly planted is another good option in the third column and high impact reserves or vorpal as decent alternatives to snapshot if you are more of a lane sniper than quick shooter. #PvP #GodPvP
data.name: PvP Monster

data.description: The perfect DMT is Vorpal Save this thing. Accurized or high cal is fine, hammer forged is high cal and small bore if accurized.
data.name: Perfect DMT

data.description: This is an instant buy. Can't get a better PvP. Grip here has two options. Smooth for balance, or Polymer for ADS speed. Main perk is Eye of the Storm. Rangefinder isn't the God (best) roll here because if you wanted range, you just pick up Ace of Spades.
data.name: Perfect Hawkmoon

data.description: Perfect PvP Cantata. No Mistake keep for sure. Range Masterwork and you buy a lotto ticket. #PvP #GodPvP #GodRoll
data.name: Perfect Cantata

data.description: Perpetual Motion/Kill Clip to two tap with team or any other damage boost. For Picky go for more range rounds, High Cal being best. Still need more picky? Range Masterwork. Finally, sights should be Fast draw for best mix of perks but sight is the perfection chaser. Any range masterwork over that sight matters more.
data.name: PvP Great
